title: Kamchatka Peninsula
description: Sitting along the northwest rim of the Pacific Ring of Fire, Kamchatka is one of the most volcanically active parcels of land in the world. At least 300 volcanoes dot the peninsula, and at least 29 of them are active.
theme:
WINTER. Special gallery to set the mood
for snowy days
